html:
5.19.22  3:45 pm   I have a really hard time finishing things. I cant seem to finish any artistic project, books or even a video game! I have a desire to start/create and do, but crossing the finish line is not something I seem to achieve lately. Have you ever struggled with this?

     yes

     I think I'm afraid of the experience ending or of "ruining" it.

     right

     I know perfectionism is holding me back. But I also don't like sub par quality. I would love your advice, you really inspired me to start creating again and just "do".

     i think you might have to trick yourself, by trying to do something bad on purpose. some way to take the pressure off

5.19.22  2:26 pm   How loud is quiet? How quiet is loud?

      not very

5.19.22  2:24 pm   Do you make the 3D renders as standalone art, without really thinking about songs it would be in,

     sometimes, especially around 2020, during my 'experimental' phase

     and then later, when making a song, pick the 3D renders that you think would accompany the song best?

      at least the option is available. but in most cases i'll want to design something specifically for the video/song at hand

5.19.22  2:15 pm   how to act natural?

      impossible. it can't be done

5.19.22  1:37 pm   Do you ever sing sea shanties? 

      it's on my to-do list

5.19.22  12:21 pm   best furniture piece

      floor

5.19.22  10:00 am   is there a specific order your videos should be watched in? if so in what order?

      any order you watch them is correct

5.19.22  9:18 am   which of your songs do you think has the most vocal-heavy arrangement?

      probably corner store

5.19.22  8:33 am   what instrument do you use the most

     shaker

     because I want to make my own bill Wurtz type stuff

5.19.22  6:18 am   favorite shape?

      milieu

5.19.22  5:20 am   what's your storytelling process? what are some things you've learnt about storytelling and writing over the years?
is there ever gonna be a "screenplays" page on billwurtz.com?
thanks

      most of the things to be learned, i've still yet to learn. but the main thing i know up to this point is that the only way to find the right answers is to experience the story up to the current point, from the beginning, in real time. preferably after not having heard it yet

5.19.22  4:04 am   Is the princess a metaphor for a prisoner?

      i don't think i thought of that, i can see how that might work

5.19.22  3:00 am   Is "mount saint helens is about to blow up" based/inspired on the story of harry r truman?

      absolutely not

5.19.22  2:11 am   when did u first get the idea/start writing 'if the world doent end'

      i came up with the idea on april 10, 2022

5.19.22  12:31 am   why can't i reach the cookie jar?

      you're obviously not high enough

5.19.22  12:06 am   Can you write a song about tables

      i almost use tables too much in my songwriting, so right now if it comes up there might be a mild attempt now to steer it in a different direction if i can

5.18.22  11:11 pm   On September 4th, 2012 at 3:10pm, you said:

"it's just like, i'm just like, 'ok, i get it. the meaning of my life is to make original music.'"

     of course. it had already been true for many many years before that. it's just sometimes i get distracted by other meaningful things as well

     When you said that, did you believe it was true?

     of course

      Do you believe it is true now?

     of course

5.18.22  8:03 pm   In if the world doesn't end, the last verse 'if the world made sense,' ends with a comma. Why

      that's a reminder that it's not a complete sentence

5.18.22  8:03 pm   do you agree with me that songs in 5/4 time lie in a moral grey area?

      no

5.18.22  7:57 pm   what's some weird misconception you had as a small kid that you can't believe you had?

      i thought that slightly older kids were huge

5.18.22  5:16 pm   favorite time signature?

      regular

5.18.22  4:28 pm   who washed canada

      you may have to do it

5.18.22  3:11 pm   Any thoughts on bananas?

      like a boomerang that doesn't come back

5.18.22  3:05 pm   what do you do when you feel bad? like not about anything in particular, just about everything?

      that would be the perfect time to generate a piece of creative content

5.18.22  2:19 pm   do you think things happen even when things are not supposed to happen? 

      different people suppose different things. as agonizing as this may seem sometimes, it can also be part of the fun

5.18.22  2:00 pm   favorite ikea item

      the sales floor

5.18.22  1:40 pm   what is your favorite letter of the alphabet and why

      y, just because it's the most recent one i had seen, at the time. so it was fresh in my memory

5.18.22  12:03 pm   What do you think the special sandals are in a more literal sense?

      nothing. that's part of the fun

5.18.22  12:03 pm   what is a minor chord?

     if you have notes C, Eb, and G together, and especially if there is also a C note in a fairly low range, that is probably considered a C minor chord. The same thing could be said about G minor, with notes G, Bb, and D, with G in the bass. and so on, with any groups of notes in this same relative orientation to each other

     and what is a major chord?

     if you have notes C, E, and G together, and especially if there is also a C note in a fairly low range, that is probably considered a C major chord. The same thing could be said about G major, with notes G, B, and D, with G in the bass. and so on, with any groups of notes in this same relative orientation to each other

     how do chord names work?

     there is an attempt to describe a chord, using small combinations of letters and numbers

     what's sus?

     for example, if you have a C major chord (with notes C, E, and G) and you swap out the E note for F instead (C, F, G), this new chord would often be considered Csus4. If you swap the note for D instead (C, D, G), it might be considered Csus2. If there is no number in the chord symbol and it just says Csus, it would almost definitely be assumed to be Csus4. but if you're a person who uses both sus2 and sus4 frequently, it's probably good to specify the number

5.18.22  10:48 am   whats your favourite type of soft cheese?

      really really hard cheese

5.18.22  10:35 am   what the heck is a tree

      i have no earthly idea

5.18.22  9:13 am   Do you often read magazine pages on the floor, of a corner store?

      that sounds like something i would do

5.18.22  8:57 am   how do you rate Welch's fruit snacks?

      unrated

5.18.22  4:23 am   is life?

      yes

5.18.22  2:58 am   what's an instrument you're too afraid to try playing on?

      jetpack

5.17.22  9:38 pm   Would you consider the "these are a few of my favorite things" song to be 3/4 or 6/8?  

      i'd prefer 6/8 at least, because, if it's 3/4 then the quarter note would have to be flying by at like 200 bpm

5.17.22  8:04 pm   why do I feel like I always look way worse in pictures than in real life

      because you can't move

5.17.22  8:03 pm   why do you think people so often describe art by name dropping other art, rather than describing the art itself?

      that reminds me of how the dictionary defines words by using other words

5.17.22  7:55 pm   is there anything that can inspire creativity im having trouble.

     yes, everything can inspire

     and how long should i practise an instrument before writing music?

      any amount of time

5.17.22  7:17 pm   are you a chair?

     no

     am i a chair?

     no

     Are we all chairs?

     no

      pLeAsE eXpLaIn i wAnT tO kNoW

5.17.22  6:20 pm   When did all of this happen?

      just now

5.17.22  6:03 pm   What is your favorite type of chair?

      how about the one that abe lincoln is sitting in, at the lincoln memorial

5.17.22  5:24 pm   is the 987 verse like Dm, Cmaj7?

      just about

5.17.22  2:11 pm   what approximate percentage of the songs you write never get finished or released?  

      never/forever hasn't arrived yet, so until then i won't be able to calculate

5.17.22  1:36 pm   opinion on the book of revelations?

      perfect setup for a sequel

5.17.22  12:43 pm   What's your opinion on bread?

      can be squashed. squashability is an ever present feature of that item

5.17.22  12:41 pm   what's in the texture of the gray avatar you use in your videos?

      nothing

5.17.22  11:56 am   why are your answers so vague?

      to counteract some of the other answers that are extremely specific

5.17.22  11:49 am   Has all of this already happened? (A lot of the time it feels that way; just watching an already-lived experience.)

      i'd say you could think of it that way, IF you also consider that it's happened infinite other possible ways also

5.17.22  10:12 am   In "fly around" the special sandals are an interesting metaphor for your body right?

      i never thought of it that way
